sections.heading: Attachment; copy of order; taxation as costs
sections.text: The officer, for making out said copy of the same, shall receive such compensation as is now allowed by law for similar services, to be taxed in the costs, unless otherwise ordered by the court.SourceG.S.1873, c. 57, ยง 4, p. 714;R.S.1913, ยง 7775;C.S.1922,
